      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Perishable
      the Perishable class extends from the Item class is used to differentiate goods that need a temperature.

      adds an item to the trucks cargo.
      void DryTruck.addCargo(Item item)
      adds an item to the trucks cargo also long as its not an instance of the Perishable Item class

      Adds an Item to the Stock

      void Stock.removeItem(Item item)
      Removes an Item from the stock
      void Stock.updateItem(Item item)
      Removes the the current version on an item within the stock and replaces with the new version
